name: Inventive Designers
overview:
Inventive Designers (ID) develops software products and provides services to help companies deliver personalized customer communications using channels such as the internet, print, e-mail, fax, etc.

Founded in 1994 and based in Antwerp, ID is present on all continents, in over 30 countries, and in 30 states of the US. Our customers are supported by a global network of resellers and partners.

ID is an active member of AIIM, XPlor International, and the AFP Consortium. In addition, ID actively participates in various working groups of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), the international organisation responsible for developing and defining open IT standards.

Our flagship products

Scriptura:

Scriptura allows you to graphically design and control the entire document flow of your business, from composition and personalization to production and delivery. It helps you deliver information to your customers at the right time, using an appropriate delivery channel. Scriptura facilitates document generation for batch production (millions of documents each year), on demand production (single unique personalized document), as well as interactive (electronic intelligent forms) document processes.
